results.title: Mevalonate Cascade Inhibition by Simvastatin Induces the Intrinsic Apoptosis Pathway via Depletion of Isoprenoids in Tumor Cells
results.text_hl: Here we show that the MEV cascade inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ induced significant cell death in a wide range of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ cell lines, including @DISEASE_Glioblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D005909 @@@glioblastoma@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Astrocytoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001254 @@@astrocytoma@@@, @DISEASE_Neuroblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D009447 @@@neuroblastoma@@@, @DISEASE_Adenocarcinoma_of_Lung @DISEASE_MESH:D000077192 @@@lung adenocarcinoma@@@, and @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@.

citations.NLM: Alizadeh J, Zeki AA, Mirzaei N, Tewary S, Rezaei Moghadam A, Glogowska A, Nagakannan P, Eftekharpour E, Wiechec E, Gordon JW, Xu FY, Field JT, Yoneda KY, Kenyon NJ, Hashemi M, Hatch GM, Hombach-Klonisch S, Klonisch T, Ghavami S. Mevalonate Cascade Inhibition by Simvastatin Induces the Intrinsic Apoptosis Pathway via Depletion of Isoprenoids in Tumor Cells Sci Rep. 2017 Mar 27;7():44841. PMID: 28344327
